translated: The Divine Man’s Mansion of the God Maṇḍūka

analyzed: id hiyā yasasā jala  abhikkantena vaṇṇena
translated: radiant with psychic power and fame,🔽outshining all directions
“In the past I was a frog,
living in the water, eating insects.

original: Muhuttaṁ cittapasādassa,🔽iddhiṁ passa yasañca me;🔽Ānubhāvañca me passa,
analyzed: muhuttam citta pasādassa  iddhim passa yasam ca me  ānubhāvañca me passa
translated: For a moment I had confidence in my mind,🔽see my psychic power and fame;🔽see my influence,
Those who for a long time
listened to the teaching of Gotama,
having gone to which one does not sorrow.”
The Divine Man’s Mansion of the God Maṇḍūka is the first.
